name: KUBIX (itch) (Oussama Khazri)
description:
Kubix is a small puzzle game where your goal is to eliminate your foes , 

you play as the white square and u actually control the movement of all the squares,

but they don't move according to the white square , they have different patterns..

This is an advanced level ,

so it's hard to grasp it at first look , gotta think a little bit ..
